answers.answer: Hi Kat,Here's a site that will hopefully help you.  I like this one because they include reviews, etc.http://www.healthgrades.com/local-doctors-directory/by-specialty/diabetes-metabolism-endocrinology/georgia-ga/atlanta-diabetes-metabolism-endocrinologistsI don't think it's easy to find a good Endo period.  I get the feeling most of them focus on the diabetes side of endocrinology which ***** for people like us trying to get in to see one, let alone be treated with the amount of attention we deserve.Good luck!Lori

question: Hi,Just wondering if anyone knows of a good endo in the Atlanta area?  I was diagnosed with Hashi in July and went to see a guy in beginning of Oct. but wasn't overly impressed.....Thanks!Kat
title: Endos in Atlanta
